mapper.select: SELECT user.user_id, user.nick_name, commodity.commodity_id, commodity.commodity_name, commodity.description, commodity.price, merchant.store_name, `order`.buy_quantity, `order`.order_cost FROM user JOIN `order` ON user.user_id = `order`.user_id JOIN commodity ON `order`.commodity_id = commodity.commodity_id JOIN merchant ON commodity.merchant_id = merchant.merchant_id WHERE user.user_id = #{userId} AND `order`.is_deleted = 0;
